subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Famer Beth Daniel will captain the United States Solheim Cup team for the 2009 matches at Rich Harvest Farms in Illinois. Daniel, a three-time L.P.G.A. player of the year and 33-time winner on the Tour, assisted Nancy Lopez and Betsy King in the last two matches against Europe. The United States will be seeking its third straight victory in 2009.
